fields.name: ReadOnly
fields.description: The flag indicating whether the Azure File shared mounted as a volume is read-only.

fields.name: ShareName
fields.description: The name of the Azure File share to be mounted as a volume.

fields.name: StorageAccountKey
fields.description: The storage account access key used to access the Azure File share.

fields.name: StorageAccountName
fields.description: The name of the storage account that contains the Azure File share.
